channel.title: rstats on Crystal Lewis
channel.description: Recent content in rstats on Crystal Lewis

item.title: A Comparison of Packages to Generate Codebooks in R
item.description: The slides are from a 5 minute lightning talk given to R-Ladies NYC. The topic was comparing 4 R packages that can be used to create codebooks for data documentation.

item.title: Data Management Overview
item.description: The slides are from a 6 part workshop series given to the Schoen Research Team at Florida State University. Parts 1 & 2 cover best practices throughout the research data managment life cycle. Parts 3-6 cover an introduction to R and RStudio and data wrangling in the Tidyverse.
